queries.query: medium dragon that can breathe water and fly fast
queries.variant: dragon that is medium-sized and breathes water while flying quickly

queries.query: water-loving dragon with high agility and bludgeoning breath attack
queries.variant: dragon that loves water, has great agility, and can attack with a bludgeoning breath

queries.query: aquatic dragon with resistance to nonmagical weapons and ability to swim
queries.variant: dragon that is aquatic, resistant to normal weapons, and can swim

queries.query: mobile dragon that avoids opportunity attacks and lives near water
queries.variant: dragon that is very mobile, can evade opportunity attacks, and inhabits watery areas

queries.query: dragon with tremorsense in water and essence link to a landmark
queries.variant: dragon that senses vibrations in water and is spiritually connected to a specific place
